channel.title: CVE Feed for VideoLAN -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VideoLAN -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-1580|2024-07-26T15:25:01.918Z -- videolan -- dav1d
item.description: An integer overflow in dav1d AV1 decoder that can occur when decoding videos with large frame size. This can lead to memory corruption within the AV1 decoder. We recommend upgrading past version 1.4.0 of dav1d.

item.title: CVE-2024-1580|2024-02-19T10:34:55.113Z -- videolan -- dav1d
item.description: An integer overflow in dav1d AV1 decoder that can occur when decoding videos with large frame size. This can lead to memory corruption within the AV1 decoder. We recommend upgrading past version 1.4.0 of dav1d.
